        cmds - the command that is to be executed.

        cmds - the command that is to be executed.
        environment - the environment in which it needs to be executed.
        imagePath - the path of the image being used
        deleteImage - boolean to decide whether we want to delete an image

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The processing to be done when this thread runs. That is, execution of provided command in the provided environment.
